resources.string: This page is the main activity users see when they first enter the application this page describes all the navigation paths the user can take. This page contains path for artists,composers,now playing/bottom navigation ,albums,playlists,recently played, genres
This is the activity where the user can find all the songs sorted alphabetically. The hurdle will be to load the data in the back ground so that the main activity loads quickkly

This is the activity where the user can find composer of all the songs on his device sorted alphabetically. The hurdle will be to access metadata of songs and display the lenght of the song, album cover etc

This is the activity where the user can control the audio playback. The user can use the functions like playing, pausing, skipping songs. The user can also add songs to the playlists. The user can use equalizer to customize and improve the output of the audio he is listening. This activity also showcases the visualizer in the form of graphics which give a soothing feeling to the user and functions on the freuency of the song.

This is the activity which gathers the songs from a particular album and shows it to the user. Albums will be sorted alphabetically. Albums also can be sorted based on the number of songs each album have.
This is the activity which displays auto generated plalylists as well as user generated playlists for easy access to the user.
This is the activity which lists songs that have been listened recently so that the user can access them easily.

This is the activity where the audio are sorted based on the stored metadata , wherein the metadata has the information of the genre of the audio. Audio of similar genre are gathered together so that he can have different ways to access the audio
